name: Santa Flight Simulator
description:
*News - The long awaited Flight Unlimited 2K16 is now available in the App Store! To celebrate this app is on sale*

You are Santa Claus in Santa Flight Simulator.

Fly Santa's Sleigh in a winter wonderland filled with houses, chimneys, hills, cars, forests, and more.

Experience piloting Santa's Sleigh from multiple camera angles including the Santa Cam. Think you have what it takes to deliver Santa's presents? Test your skills in the Santa Present Drop. Buzz past houses, land on the streets, and fly around the town in the ultimate Santa Simulator experience.

Features
- Pilot Santa's Sleigh in beautiful high definition graphics
- Control Rudolph and the rest of the Reindeer
- Explore the winter town complete with chimney smoke and snow effects
- Multiple camera angles including 1st Person Santa Cam
- Test your skill in the Present Drop Challenge
- Gamecenter leaderboard integration
